entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is trying to figure out how Harry got across the Age Line.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Harry's cousins who also tried to get across the Age Line but failed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who got across the Age Line without using the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: the invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that can make someone invisible and was used by Harry's friends in the past.

relationships.description: Ron is asking Harry how he got across the Age Line.
Ron is comparing himself to Fred and George, who also tried to get across the Age Line but failed.
Harry used the Invisibility Cloak to cross the Age Line.
Ron is comparing himself to Fred and George, who also tried to get across the Age Line but failed.
